00032 #ifndef MESH_DATA
00033 #define MESH_DATA
00034 
00035 #include "omega/osystem.h"
00036 #include "omega/Color.h"
00037 
00038 namespace omega 
00039 {
00040 namespace scene 
00041 {
00046     class MeshData
00047     {
00048     public:
00049                 int getNumVertices() { return vertices.size(); }
00050                 int getNumTriangles() { return triangles.size(); }
00051                 
00052                 Vector3f& getVertexPosition(int i) { return vertices[i]; }
00053                 Color& getVertexColor(int i) { return colors[i]; }
00054                 Vector3f& getVertexNormal(int i) { return normals[i]; }
00055                 Triangle& getTriangle(int i) { return triangles[i]; }
00056 
00057                 void addTriangle(const Triangle& tri) 
00058                 { 
00059                         triangles.push_back(tri); 
00060                 }
00061 
00062                 void addVertex(const Vector3f& pos) 
00063                 {
00064                         myHasColors = false;
00065                         myHasNormals = false;
00066                         myIsDirty = true;
00067                         vertices.push_back(pos);
00068                 }
00069 
00070                 void addVertex(const Vector3f& pos, const Vector3f& normal) 
00071                 {
00072                         myHasColors = false;
00073                         myHasNormals = true;
00074                         myIsDirty = true;
00075                         vertices.push_back(pos);
00076                         normals.push_back(normal);
00077                 }
00078 
00079                 void addVertex(const Vector3f& pos, const Vector3f& normal, const Color& color)
00080                 {
00081                         myHasColors = true;
00082                         myHasNormals = true;
00083                         myIsDirty = true;
00084                         vertices.push_back(pos);
00085                         colors.push_back(color);
00086                         normals.push_back(normal);
00087                 }
00088 
00089                 void addVertex(const Vector3f& pos, const Color& color)
00090                 {
00091                         myHasColors = true;
00092                         myHasNormals = false;
00093                         myIsDirty = true;
00094                         vertices.push_back(pos);
00095                         colors.push_back(color);
00096                 }
00097 
00098                 //void addVertex(const Vector3f& pos, const Vector2f& tex) {/*TODO*/ }
00099                 //void addVertex(const Vector3f& pos, const Vector3f& normal, const Vector2f& tex) {/*TODO*/ }
00100                 //void addVertex(const Vector3f& pos, const Vector3f& normal, const Color& color, const Vector2f& tex) {/*TODO*/ }
00101                 //void addVertex(const Vector3f& pos, const Color& color, const Vector2f& tex) {/*TODO*/ }
00102 
00103                 bool hasColors() { return myHasColors; }
00104                 bool hasNormals() { return myHasNormals; }
00105 
00106                 const AlignedBox3& getBoundingBox() 
00107                 { 
00108                         if(myIsDirty) update(); 
00109                         return myBBox; 
00110                 }
00111 
00112                 void clear() 
00113                 {
00114                         vertices.clear();
00115                         colors.clear();
00116                         normals.clear();
00117                         triangles.clear();
00118                         myHasColors = false;
00119                         myHasNormals = false;
00120                         myIsDirty = true;
00121                 }
00122         
00123         protected:
00124         std::vector< Vector3f >   vertices;
00125         std::vector< Color >    colors;
00126         std::vector< Vector3f >   normals;
00127         std::vector< Triangle > triangles;
00128 
00129                 bool myHasColors;
00130                 bool myHasNormals;
00131 
00132                 bool myIsDirty;
00133 
00134         private:
00135                 void update()
00136                 {
00137                         // Reset bounding box.
00138                         float fmax = std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
00139                         float fmin = -std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
00140                         Vector3f vmin(fmax, fmax, fmax);
00141                         Vector3f vmax(fmin, fmin, fmin);
00142 
00143                         // Recompute bounding box.
00144                         for(int i = 0; i < getNumVertices(); i++)
00145                         {
00146                                 const Vector3f& v = getVertexPosition(i);
00147                                 for(int j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00148                                 {
00149                                         if(v[j] < vmin[j]) vmin[j] = v[j];
00150                                         if(v[j] > vmax[j]) vmax[j] = v[j];
00151                                 }
00152                         }
00153 
00154                         myBBox.setExtents(vmin, vmax);
00155 
00156                         myIsDirty = false;
00157                 }
00158 
00159         private:
00160                 AlignedBox3 myBBox;
00161     };
00162 }; // namespace scene
00163 } // namespace omega
00164 
00165 
00166 #endif
